name: Cursed University
description:
Play as an student that must rescue his university, fight against the evil waves of enemies that want you die, fight with honor rescue your university.

The game is in development process, we will be grateful with you if you let us know for any kind of implementation/gameplay error. we hope you enjoy.

It is important that you run the game in (800 x 600) screen resolution if you can, the hud can be affected in game if you dont use this resolution. Thank you.
